sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russia claims to have shot down 10 drones in occupied Crimea on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The attack, according to Moscow, included aerial and underwater devices that were targeting Sevastopol, home to Russia's Black Sea fleet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There were no reported casualties or damage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The region has been a regular target of air and naval drone attacks since the start of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said his country has sufficient stockpile of cluster bombs and threatened to use the controversial weapons if Ukraine did the same after Kiev received a delivery of the bombs from the U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces are making steady progress along the northern and southern flanks of Pakhmut, which Russian forces have occupied since May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fighting is also raging in the Zaporizhia region, where Ukrainian forces are making minimal gains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: French media reports Franco-British actress and singer Jane Birkin has died,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: aged 76, at her home in Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A naturalised French citizen, Birkin moved to France in the late 1960s and was probably best known internationally for her relationship with French singer Serge Gainsbourg, with whom she had a daughter, Charlotte.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Together, they were an iconic couple who found fame with the unforgettable duet Je T'aime Moi Non Plus in 1969.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In 1980, she left Gainsbourg and later married film director Jacques Douallon, long after Gainsbourg's death in 1991.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Long after Gainsbourg's death in 1991, and despite trials such as the death of her daughter Kate in 2013, and a long recovery from leukemia, she continued to sing the work of the man with whom she'd formed a legendary relationship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tourists at the Trevi Fountain in Rome. Come le temperature sono risolte a livelli record, il governo italiano ha issuto un alerta rosso per 16 città in tutto il paese, avvicinando le persone a evitare la luce diretta tra le 11 e le 6.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: E gli animali in Roma sono stati alimentati con cibo freddo per aiutare a tenere l'acqua. avvertiamo fisicamente proprio insomma questa calura poi protratta nel tempo perché non è più per qualche breve periodo come accadeva qualche anno fa no per un paio di giorni ormai purtroppo si dilunga per più di un mese questo caldo quindi diciamo gli effetti si avvertono Greta Thunberg posted a picture on Twitter saying, is this the sign you're looking for? Meanwhile, on Spanish island of La Palma, the heatwave is being blamed for a massive forest fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Authorities say around 4,000 people have now been evacuated as emergency workers try to bring the wildfire under control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Voters in Spain have been lining up to register for postal ballots

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ahead of the 23rd of July snap general election. The deadline to vote by post has been extended until next Thursday because of the large number of requests. Two and a half million people so far. This is more than double the number that did so in the last election in 2019. More than 270 offices opened on Sunday in Spain's main cities and on the coast to speed up the process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ballots are also open this weekend in embassies and consulates abroad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Israeli-occupied West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Officials say a Palestinian gunman opened fire on a car outside a settlement on Sunday, wounding three Israelis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A search is underway for the perpetrator who reportedly fired shots from a passing vehicle. A 35 year old man is in hospital in a serious but stable condition while his two daughters were lightly injured. The incident is the latest in a cycle of attacks and counter-attacks that has gripped the region, driving up the death toll in what is the worst fighting in the West Bank in nearly two decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Forty-one migrants, including 25 unaccompanied minors, have been rescued in the Mediterranean Sea by a humanitarian ship operated by Doctors Without Borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The operation took place 48 kilometers off the Libyan coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They were traveling in a small rubber dinghy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: According to members of the rescue team, the boat was not properly inflated and could have sunk in a very short time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The people on board were apparently in good condition after sailing for just one day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The migrants came from Somalia, the Ivory Coast and Cameroon.
